name: Blam - Endless Roguelike
description:
Blam is a difficult, endless, and fast-paced 1bit roguelike! Explore dungeons, blast through enemies, and seek treasure. How far will you get? Made in one week for the College Game Jam.

Features:

  • Bullet Hell Gameplay
  • Randomly Generated Levels
  • Endless Amount Of Levels
  • 4 Unique Enemies
  • Multiple Upgrades
  • Destructible Terrain
  • Treasure
  • 1bit Art Style
  • 6 Different Color Palettes To Choose From

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrow Keys - Hold Down To Shoot
  • Space - Place Bomb
  • Tab - Interact (Open Chest/Go To Lower Floor)
  • E - Toggle Map And Upgrade Info
  • ESC - Toggle Options

(Note: forgot to remove a debug tool where if you press "R" you'll skip the whole level)
